title: How to change “How do you know?” into passive voice - Quora

response.answer_text: Well, you would have to supply an object for the verb “know,” as in “How do you know that?”. Then the passive version would be “How is that known by you?”
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Nabi Ullah Stanekzai

response.answer_text: You can’t; intransitive verbs do not take an object and thus cannot be rendered in passive voice. ———-//
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Nabi Ullah Stanekzai
